H0.text: what is the main industry in the canadian shield. Forestry

H1.text: what is the main industry in the canadian shield. Hydroelectric Power

H2.text: what is the main industry in the canadian shield. Tourism

H3.text: what is the main industry in the canadian shield. mining

A4.text: The Canadian Shield is one of the world's richest areas for mineral ores. It is filled with substantial deposits of nickel, gold, silver, and copper.

A5.text: The shield is covered in parts by vast boreal forests in the south that support natural ecosystems as well as a major logging industry.

A6.text: In Northern Canada, mining—particularly hardrock mining—has long been one of the most significant sources of economic development.

A7.text: Many towns in northern Canada, where agriculture is difficult, are sustained by nearby mines or sources of timber.
